member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Clipbase.Clear
member.summary: Clear: Clears the clipbase by closing and recreating it.

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.InUse
member.summary: InUse: Returns 1 if the database slot is in use; 0 otherwise.
member.returns: returns 1 if the database slot is in use; 0 otherwise.

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.Getfilename(System.String@)
member.summary: Getfilename: get the name of the current database file. Returns "[empty]" for an empty base, "[clipbase]" for the clipbase.
member.param: The name variable passed by reference

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.NumGames
member.summary: NumGames: Takes optional database number and returns number of games.

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.Isreadonly
member.summary: Isreadoonly: is the base read only

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.Close
member.summary: Close: Closes the current or specified database.

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Open: takes a database name and opens the database. If either the index file or game file cannot be opened for reading and writing, then the database is opened read-only and will not be alterable.

member.name: M:ScincFuncs.Base.Autoloadgame(System.Boolean,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Autoloadgame: Sets or returns the autoload number for the database - the game number to load.
member.param: Whether to get or set the database
